mlca.guiÂ¶

Graphical User Interface for mLCA Provides three modes to pass data tables to mLCA:

  1. via a graphical table - click on fields to change the values content is saved as csv file and then proceeds like (2)

  2. from a csv file on disk which can be selected from a file selector

  3. from a text file containing QCA or CNA output, can be selected using a file selector

Output is displayed in a simple pdf viewer with possibility to turn pages and to zoom.

Causal-mechanistic modeling using Coincidence Analysis
